author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of the Congress who have applied for party ticket to contest from constituencies in Tiruvannamalai district in the Assembly election are to be interviewed on Wednesday.

The aspirants from Tiruvannamalai south and north district units would be interviewed in the south district committee office near Anna Statue in Kosamada Street starting from 10 a.m. on Wednesday. South district committee president G.Kumar, North district president M.Vasantharaj and observer from state committee K.I.Manikandan will participate .
title: Congress ticket aspirants to be interviewed today
